title: Anybody else having issues with their Pixel 5's navigation bar
content: I've had nothing but issues with my Pixel 5 first it started with the screen hardly ever responding when you touch it and as of today December 4th my navigation bar decided not to work it will work for about 5 minutes and then I have to restart the phone and then it works for about 5 minutes and I have to restart the phone does anybody else having these problems
